At 5:00 PM, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Starry Point, moving northwest at 25 miles per hour. HAZARD: Tornado and quarter sized hail.

item.title: A call to the Ether
item.description: In the endless expanse of garbage data, does anyone read me?

item.title: Day of Inception
item.description: The community sapling has finally been planted.
